page.title: 06INDUSTRY AND TRADE.
page.content: There are two major manufacturing companies in the area and they together employ over 150.These are {Adnam's,}a long_established brewery operating in a traditional way,and {Field's,}who are relatively new to the area and manufacture sheet metal cabinets for vending machines and similar items. Major employers in service industries are the local authority and{St.Felix, an independent girls school.In addition there are about a hundred small businesses,many of them family operated,which are members of the Southwold Chamber of Trade.These cover the usual food,clothing and hardware requirements of the area and make provisions for the Summer Season catering, accommodation, travel & finance requirements.
